room_title: Escape room "The Bomb Room" by Escape Kemah in Houston
review: We tried this out and even though we "blew up" in the bomb room, we still had a good time. We will definitely do this again soon!

room_title: Escape room "The Bomb Room" by Escape Kemah in Houston
review: It was an awesome experience and we managed to escape the Bomb Room. I can't remember our host's name, but she was great.

room_title: Escape room "The Bomb Room" by Escape Kemah in Houston
review: We had an absolute blast doing the bomb room (pun intended)! We escaped! It was challenging and fun for our group of 5. The host was fantastic! We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "The Bomb Room" by Escape Kemah in Houston
review: I have never done an escape room before and my husband and I just left. The two of us attempted to diffuse the bomb. Although we DID lose, we had so much fun and actually progressed pretty well for it only being the two of us. Will definitely try the Fear room next time!
